exe1.title: Reverse String
exe1.description:
Write a program which reverses a string and print it on the console.
Examples:
input: String output: gnirtS
input: Git output: tiG

exe2.title: Smallest of Three Numbers
exe2.description:
Write a method to print the smallest of three integer numbers.
Examples:
input: 3 8 24 output: 3
input: 44 95 29 output: 29

exe3.title: NxN Matrix
exe3.description:
Write a method that receives a single integer n and prints nxn matrix with that number.
Examples:
input: 3 output: 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3
input: 2 output: 2 2 2 2

exe4.title: Math operations
exe4.description:
Write a method that receives two number and an operator, calculates the result and returns it. You will be given three lines of input. The first will be the first number, the second one will be the operator and the last one will be the second number. The possible operators are: / * + -
Examples:
input: 5 * 2 output: 10
input: 4 / 2 output: 2

exe5.title: Day of Week
exe5.description:
Enter a day number [1â€¦7] and print the day name or "Invalid day!".
Examples:
input: 2 output: Tuesday
input: 11 output: Invalid day!
